updated.title: Your app has been updated to the newest version!
updated.content:
New features include:
-Added your sobriety date to the day counter
-Updated the literature
-Fixed an bug that was preventing many users on Android from being able to contribute
-Added FaceID/biometric security to the journal entries
-Bug Fixes and other small housekeeping tasks

If you haven't already, please consider becoming a supporter by clicking the support us tab at the bottom of the home screen. This update took a lot of hard work and your support is what allows me to continue maintaining and updating the app! More to come!!!

-Ben S.

needsUpdate.title: A new version is available!
needsUpdate.content:
Clicking the button below will take you to the app store where you can manually update the app by clicking 'update'.

Highlighting and notes are now available in the Big Book!!!

If you haven't already, please consider becoming a supporter by clicking the support us tab at the bottom of the home screen. Your support means I am able to dedicate the time needed to maintain and update the app.

 PLEASE NOTE: the 'in app purchase' indicator is referencing the OPTION to contribute. The app is completely FREE to download and update, and is ALWAYS fully featured no matter your contributor status. It should only take a few seconds to update, then you can get back to the literature ðŸ˜Š

message.title: Notification
message.content:
All,
The meeting Finder appears to be temporarily down. This seems to be due to a compatability issue, caused by recent changes to the meeting list. Please do not contact me about this issue, I am working to resolve it. You can still access the meeting list in your browser at https://aa-intergroup.org/meetings/ or by clicking the link below. I am working on an emergency update asap.
-Ben S
